title: Nakama Beekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, use 1 bee to prevent a player from taking game actions for the rest of the phase.
- During the day, use 2 bees to choose two players and deal a Basic attack to a random one.
- During the day, use 3 bees to force all players who haven't voted yet to vote for a player of your choice. You may only use this ability after at least one non-Crew player has voted.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will earn 1 bee every day. You can use 2 abilities per day.

desc:
Post 3076
*I'm the man... who will become the bzzzz king!*
